item.description: Besides managing a course, my first summer goal is to understand the Berge maximum theorem (BMT). According to Wikipedia, the theorem is useful for describing continuity conditions for the solution of parameterized optimization problems. Since I’m still new to the whole subject, I don’t quite understand what that means! More on its interpretation and applications (hopefully!) soon.
